channel.title: Ciconia FM - Game Over - Order of the Public Bath Wins
channel.description:
![Ciconia FM|690x465, 75%](upload://3cyxMRacLAlBRykMY841LtDASqP.jpeg) ## Ciconia FM: When They Cry - designed and hosted by @astand, cohosted by @KyoDaz. Reviewer is @osieorb18, alt mod is @DatBird. ## Rules: * Follow all [Global Rules](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244) and [Official Forum Game Rules.](https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926) * Make at least 15 game-related posts each day (unless day ends early). If you fail to meet this requirement, you might get replaced. For 0 posting in full game day I will force replace you without any questions. * Don't edit posts. This includes quickediting for typos, just don't do it. * Alt accounts are allowed. Tell me your identity privately and send an application to @DatBird if you wish to play on an alt. You are allowed to speculate on identities of alt accounts. ## General information: * Closed setup. * The game will contain bastard and/or experimental mechanics. However, OP will never lie, your rolecard will never lie, and no flips will ever be false. * Days are 48 hours, nights are 24 hours. * Eliminations are majority + plurality. In case of a tie, elimination will be randed. * At EoD, votes made up to :59 mark will be accepted (but not at :00 mark). * It will not be announced if the game reaches MYLO/LYLO. * [color=007F46]**Order of the Public Bath**[/color] is uninformed majority and [color=CC000D]**Ninth Prime Chivalric Order**[/color] is informed minority. * [color=007F46]**Order of the Public Bath's**[/color] win condition is: *Eliminate all members of the Ninth Prime Chivalric Order and all other possible threats to Order of the Public Bath.* * [color=CC000D]**Ninth Prime Chivalric Order's**[/color] win condition is: *Achieve parity with the Order of the Public Bath and eliminate all other possible threats to Ninth Prime Chivalric Order.* * Other win conditions may or may not exist. ## Game mechanics: * There are no conversions. * There may or may not be lost wolves. * Flavor/role claims are allowed **at your own risk**. * Flavor (character name, in-universe faction and kette) isn't alignment indicative, but might be role indicative for some roles while being misleading or not role indicative for others. * [color=CC000D]**Ninth Prime Chivalric Order's**[/color] factional kill is assigned. Performing it doesn't prevent using other night actions. * You can't perform actions on N0 unless specified otherwise. * Deadline for submitting actions is one hour before the end of the phase (whether day or night). * If you have several different night (day) abilities, then you can use all of them during a single night (day), unless specified otherwise.
## Example rolecard:
[details="VT"] ![Example Town|1018x939](upload://uHyLJtVz7IB36iLqG4A7faDiIKn.jpeg) [/details]
## Backups: 1. Arctic 2. Prophylaxis 3. Whysper ## Theatergoers: 1. Alice (uninformed) 2. Appelsiini (uninformed) 3. Arete (informed) 4. DatBird (uninformed) 5. Intensify (informed) 6. Jane (uninformed) 7. katze (informed) 8. Silviu200530 (uninformed)
